attributes.action: Stop energy suppliers been able to have a standing charge in this crisis
attributes.additional_details: Because it helps all the people struggling through this crisis every little penny saved is a fortune to the unfortunate like my self! Please look and help us
attributes.background: I want them to look at the company's supplying energy and there standing charges especially when there costs are through the roof the supply charges are active daily even when your energy is not in use!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621561
